name: wheezy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
making a high, rough noise while breathing because of some breathing difficulty: He took a few wheezy breaths. She's stopped coughing but is still a little bit wheezy. See
wheeze
More examplesFewer examplesIt's difficult to recall when we last heard his wheezy chuckle.She had a wheezy chest which had led to her first asthma attack. The wheezy old organ began to puff and play.
